enchantment.enchiridion.ashes_curse.desc: Sets drops from this item on fire.
enchantment.enchiridion.barding.desc: Reduces damage towards the mob you are riding.
enchantment.enchiridion.crumble.desc: Some blocks such as stone and deepslate are mined faster and do not drop items.
enchantment.enchiridion.dredge.desc: Adds a chance to fish up extra items while fishing.
enchantment.enchiridion.exhilarating.des: Prevents the user from using up hunger from mining blocks.
enchantment.enchiridion.experienced.desc: Fishing with this fishing rod grants more experience.
enchantment.enchiridion.ice_strike.desc: Causes additional freezing damage and slower movements when used to attack a mob.
enchantment.enchiridion.jousting.desc: Increases entity interaction range of the weapon whilst riding a mob.
enchantment.enchiridion.reach.desc: Increases block interaction range of the tool.
enchantment.enchiridion.reliable.desc: Increases the enchantment quality and durability of fished up items.
resourcePack.enchiridion.default_enchant: Reverts the modified Enchanted Book textures.
dataPack.enchiridion.vanilla_enchantment: Modifies vanilla enchantments to fit within Enchiridion.
resourcePack.enchiridion.enchantment_des: Modifies any enchantment descriptions to match Enchiridion's modifications.
